sentences.english: The polar and egg nuclei of the female gametophyte are genetically identical.
sentences.chinese: 雌配子體中的極核和卵核遺傳上是同一的。

sentences.english: The city is the mainly melting-pot for mankind, meanwhile, it is the pole pit of economic growth in region.
sentences.chinese: 城市是人類的主要聚居地，也是區域經濟增長的極核。
